name: Breaking the Loosh Extraction Cycles
description: Exposing and neutralizing systems designed to extract psychic and emotional energy from individuals and groups.
focus: Breaking the Cycle of Emotional Drain

cards.title: Unveiling Loosh Collection Mechanisms
cards.description: Revealing the invisible systems that siphon human emotional and psychic energy.
bulletpoints: Mapping out locations and events used for mass energy harvesting.
Recognizing emotional manipulation tactics that induce loosh production.
Tracking elite rituals and corporate structures linked to energy siphoning.
cards.summaryText: Map harvesting hot spots, spot emotional manipulation, and trace elite rituals siphoning loosh.

cards.title: Breaking Free from Loosh Farming Systems
cards.description: Techniques for cutting off energy supply chains used by the IDC.
bulletpoints: Strengthening personal energy fields to prevent unauthorized siphoning.
Practicing emotional transmutation to redirect loosh-based triggers.
Detaching from external validation cycles that reinforce energy extraction.
cards.summaryText: Fortify your field, transmute trigger energy, and exit validation loops that feed extraction.

cards.title: Reclaiming Your Personal Energy
cards.description: Establishing energetic autonomy and severing ties to loosh-extracting systems.
bulletpoints: Developing daily practices to reinforce self-sustained energetic integrity.
Using ritual deprogramming to break psychic contracts enabling energy theft.
Harnessing self-awareness to reclaim personal emotional and psychic power.
cards.summaryText: Anchor daily integrity, deprogram psychic contracts, and reclaim sovereign emotional power.
